feature: Add user login with email and password

response.token: string - JWT token for authenticated session

backend_tasks: Validate the request body to ensure email and password are provided
Check the database for a user with the provided email
Verify the provided password against the stored password hash
Generate a JWT token upon successful authentication
Return the JWT token and user information in the response
Handle errors and return appropriate status codes and messages
frontend_tasks: Create a login form with fields for email and password
Implement form validation to ensure fields are not empty
Send a POST request to /api/login with email and password on form submission
Handle the response to store the JWT token in local storage
Redirect the user to the dashboard upon successful login
Display error messages for invalid credentials
assumptions: The user database exists and is accessible
User passwords are stored securely as hashed values
JWT tokens can be generated and verified
The frontend application can make HTTP requests to the backend API
The user is redirected to a dashboard upon successful login
